text: Abimin obasının Selçuklu sınırında olduğunu öğrendim.
english: my brother's tribe was located on the Seljuk border.
We can ask him for help.

text: Bilirsin, senin için canını bile verir.
english: You know, he would even give his life for you.
We must resolve this issue without bloodshed.

text: Sen ne dediğini bilir misin evlat?
english: you know what you're saying, son?
I will also bring a guest with me.
you taking Esma to the palace?
(Music - Strings) He won't be able to
deny the tattoo on the back of his neck.

text: Eğer onu saraya sağ salim götürmeyi başarabilirsek...
english: If we can manage to get him safely to the palace...
(Alpargu) My Lord! Just when we thought

text: Kara Toygar belasından kurtulalım derken, Nasır'a tosladık.
english: we were rid of Kara Toygar , we ran into Nasır. If we can't eliminate

text: Süleyman Şah ile oğullarını ortadan kaldıramazsak...

english: who knows what other problems we'll face. So
what are we going to do, sir? We'll do
... you've found the courage to face me, huh? You used

text: Yıva denilen o büyücü kaltağı, bebemi öldürmek için kullandın Kurdoğlu.
english: that sorceress named Yıva to kill my baby, Kurdoğlu. And
you went and killed Yıva. He

text: Sen bizim anlaşmamızı bozdun Selcan Hatun.
english: You broke our agreement, Selcan Hatun. When
I went to kill Suleiman Shah...

text: ...beni de ortadan kaldırmak için arkamdan kocanı gönderdin.
english: ... you sent your husband after me to eliminate me as well.
I didn't think he'd be this incompetent.
Since the baby is still alive...
...we can't be considered too late for peace.
What do you want from me? I want to ensure

text: Babamın kanı yerde kalmasın isterim Kurdoğlu!
english: my father's blood is not spilled in vain, Kurdoğlu!

text: ...Süleyman'ın kılıcından otağa yayılırken ben de oradaydım.
english: ...I was there as it spread from Solomon's sword to the tent .

text: Onu durdurmak için elimden geleni yaptım.
english: I did everything I could to stop him.
(Kurdoğlu) But Süleyman is a very ruthless person.
more than a brother to me, Selcan.
Then you will do what needs to be done, Kurdoğlu! What about
We'll talk about that when the time comes.

text: Şimdi yapman gereken bir iş var.
english: Now you have a task to do. It's

text: Eline yüzüne bulaştırmadan yapman gereken önemli bir iş!
english: an important task that you need to complete without messing it up!
Ertuğrul will go to Aleppo. He'll take

text: Giderken o kadını da yanında götürecek.
english: that woman with him when he leaves.

text: Ben de sizinle birlikte geliyorum Halep'e.
english: I'm coming with you to Aleppo too.

text: En azından birimiz obada babamla kalsaydı.
english: At least one of us should have stayed in the camp with my father. If
we can't get that woman back safely...
...we'll have neither a village to return to...
...and then I'll go to the Templars' castle.

text: (Şahabettin) Sen ne dediğini bilir misin bey oğlu?
english: (Shahabettin) Do you know what you're saying, my son?

text: (Şahabettin) Oraya öyle elini kolunu sallayarak giremezsin.
english: (Şahabettin) You can't just walk in there waving your arms around. Even
if you get in, you can't get out!

text: Benim de senden ricam, o soysuzlara kısa bir mektup yazmandır.
english: My request to you is to write a short letter to those scoundrels. You
These are the best weaves I've ever seen.

text: Doğrusu bu kadar iyisini beklemiyordum, Hayme Ana.
english: Honestly, I wasn't expecting it to be this good, Mother Hayme.

text: Yüzyıllardır atalarımızdan, analarımızdan ne öğrendiysek odur.
english: It is what we have learned from our ancestors and mothers for centuries.
Without altering it, without adding any deception.

text: Bu yüzden gittiğiniz her yerde itibar görüyorsunuz.
english: That's why you're respected wherever you go .

text: Gerçi Halep'te işlerin biraz ters gittiğini duydum ama...
english: Although I heard things went a bit wrong in Aleppo ...
deeds of the son of a Kayı bey (a tribal chieftain).
He turned the city upside down.

text: Biz işimize bakalım, bunlar beni ilgilendiren mesele değil.
english: 's focus on our work; these things don't concern me.
You certainly deserve the price you're asking. This is the
reward for all your hard work.
...this is the last amount I have left!

text: ...ama altı yüz kırk altına, bu işi bugün, burada bitirebiliriz.
english: ...but six hundred and forty gold, we can finish this job here, today.

text: Her ne kadar Süleyman Şah, sizi bana gönderdiyse de...
english: Although Suleiman Shah sent you to me...
And peace be upon you. Wa alaikum assalam

text: Ebu Hişam, müsaade ederseniz sizi beyimizin yanına götüreyim.
english: Abu Hisham, if you'll allow me, I'll take you to our master.

text: Onunla da bu konuda istişare edersiniz.
english: You should consult with him about this matter as well.
have some good news for you, Titus.
...will set off with his Alps tomorrow.

text: Sizin için çalışan kadın, neydi adı? Ha Esma.
english: The woman who worked for you, what was her name? Oh, Esma.
They will take him to Aleppo, to Al-Aziz.
I'm waiting for you to come.

text: (Titus ses) Üstad, Eftelya'nın Ertuğrul tarafından Halep'e götürüleceğini bilmeli.
english: (Titus voice) The Master must know that Eftelya will be taken to Aleppo by Ertuğrul.

text: Baba, içinde sakladıklarını ne vakit söyleyeceksin bana?
english: Father, when will you tell me what you've been hiding inside?

text: (Halime) Kaç gündür ikimize de yaşattığın yetmedi mi?
english: (Halime) Haven't the things you've put us both through these past few days been enough ?

text: El Aziz, seni eşi olarak almak istediğini söyledi.
english: El Aziz said he wanted to take you as his wife.

text: Hepimiz için en doğrusunun bu olduğuna karar verdim kızım.
english: I've decided this is best for all of us, my daughter.

text: Senden ilk defa bir şey istiyorum kızım.
english: first time I'm asking you for something, my daughter.
(Music - Percussion and strings) You must accept this offer,
not just for your own good...

text: ...kardeşinin iyiliği için de bu teklifi kabul etmelisin.

english: I cannot allow you to leave the village.
Our husband has recovered his health, madam. It's
What has Ertuğrul done again? He's a jinx who brings

text: Gittiği her yere bela getiren uğursuzun teki o!
(Selcan) Senin başına da olmadık belalar açacak!
english: (Selcan) She'll cause you all sorts of trouble too!
I don't want you to go with him. Ok
(Gündoğdu) I'm fed up with your unhealthy behavior.

text: Onun kuyruğuna takılırsan neler olacağını bilemezsin.
english: You never know what might happen if you follow his lead. The sun has
Don't leave me alone with my baby!
Don't do this to us! Please, I beg you
have to go for our baby... for our village.
-No, I don't want you to go. (Kissing sound)

text: (Selcan) Ne olursun bizi yalnız bırakma! Gitme ne olur!
english: (Selcan) Please don't leave us alone! Please don't go !
You can't go! I'm telling you, you can't go ! The sun has
-You can't go, please don't go! -(Gündoğdu) Let go!

text: Yalvarırım gitme, gitme ne olursun! Gündoğdu!..
english: Please don't go, don't go, please! Good morning!..

text: Yalvarırım baba, Gündoğdu'nun gitmesine izin verme!
english: Please, father, don't let Gündoğdu go!

text: Hayır, hayır, izin veremezsiniz baba, gitmelerine izin veremezsiniz.
english: No, no, you can't allow it, father, you can't let them go. Don't let

text: Bilip de söyleyemediğin bir şey mi var?
english: there something you know but can't say?
(Suleiman Shah) Tell me! Is there something

text: Bildiğin, duyduğun, şüphelendiğin bir şey mi var?
english: you know, have heard, or suspect?
You disturbed my peace. Now you'll be quiet!
